## RULES, REGULATIONS & STUDENT GUIDELINES

### Branch Change Policy
**Eligibility:**
- Completion of first year
- Merit-based selection
- CGPA criteria
- No backlogs
- Seat availability

**Process:**
- Application submission
- Merit list publication
- Counseling (if required)
- Final allotment

### Continuity Form Requirements
**Mandatory For:**
- All B.E. regular students
- All B.Arch. regular students
- All B.Plan. regular students
- All M.E. students (3rd semester)

**Submission:**
- Online through mbmiums.in
- Annual requirement
- Deadline strictly enforced
- Prerequisites for examination

### Practical Training Requirements

**For B.E. 2nd & 3rd Year:**
- Mandatory summer training
- Guidelines published annually
- Duration: As per norms
- Industry or institutional
- Certificate required
- Evaluation component

**For B.E.

regular students
- All B.Arch. regular students
- All B.Plan. regular students
- All M.E. students (3rd semester)

**Submission:**
- Online through mbmiums.in
- Annual requirement
- Deadline strictly enforced
- Prerequisites for examination

### Practical Training Requirements

**For B.E. 2nd & 3rd Year:**
- Mandatory summer training
- Guidelines published annually
- Duration: As per norms
- Industry or institutional
- Certificate required
- Evaluation component

**For B.E. Final Year (8th Semester):**
- Major project mandatory
- In-house or industry options
- NOC format provided
- Evaluation guidelines specific
- Presentation required

### Result & Grading System
**Key Points:**
- CGPA-based grading
- Grading system conversion available
- Medium of instruction: English/Hindi
- Results on mbmiums.in portal
- Re-evaluation provisions

### Anti-Ragging Policy
**Framework:**
- Zero-tolerance approach
- Anti-Ragging Squads operational
- 24/7 helpline
- Anonymous complaints
- Strict disciplinary action
- Ragging Act applicable

**Prevention Measures:**
- Regular awareness programs
- Squad patrolling
- CCTV surveillance
- Mentorship programs
- Orientation on anti-ragging

# MBM UNIVERSITY - COMPREHENSIVE KNOWLEDGE BASE FOR RAG SYSTEM (PART 1 of 3)

## ORGANIZATIONAL IDENTITY & BASIC INFORMATION

### Official Names & Designations
- **Full Name:** Malviya Bhoothnath Mehta University (MBM University)
- **Short Name:** MBMU, MBM University
- **Former Status:** MBM Engineering College under Jai Narain Vyas University (JNVU)
- **Current Status:** Autonomous State University
- **Establishment:** September 2021 by Government of Rajasthan
- **Location:** Jodhpur, Rajasthan, India
- **Type:** State University, Technical Education Institution
- **Legacy:** Over 70 years in technical education

### Contact & Digital Presence
- **Official Website:** www.mbm.ac.in
- **Student Portal:** mbmiums.in
- **Email (Admissions):** admissions@mbm.ac.in
- **Admission Helpline Hours:** 10 AM to 2 PM (working days only)
- **Google Maps:** https://goo.gl/maps/Dvetx9BNSWucCC9H9

### Key Pages & Resources
- Homepage: www.mbm.ac.in/
- News Room (All Updates): www.mbm.ac.in/newsroom/all
- Admission Updates: www.mbm.ac.in/newsroom/admission
- Examination Updates: www.mbm.ac.in/newsroom/examination
- Calendars: www.mbm.ac.in/newsroom/calendars
- Research: www.mbm.ac.in/newsroom/research
- Career/Jobs: www.mbm.ac.in/newsroom/career
- Hostel Updates: www.mbm.ac.in/newsroom/hostel
- Tenders: www.mbm.ac.in/newsroom/tenders-procurements
- FAQ: www.mbm.ac.in/faq
- E-Resources: www.mbm.ac.in/university-e-resources

## LEADERSHIP & GOVERNANCE

### Vice Chancellor
**Prof. Ajay Kumar Sharma** - Hon'ble Vice Chancellor

**Message:** "At MBM University, we strive to keep the quality of our academics, research and innovation at priority to keep up with the pace of technological advancement. The university focuses on providing latest in-demand academic programmes and cutting-edge research opportunities. In the near short term, university plans to implement the NEP 2020; and establish strategic and result-oriented collaboration with industries, research organizations and academic institutions within and outside the country. Built upon our legacy of being a pioneer in technical education in India, we wish to become an institution of international standards through our sincere efforts, discipline and dedication in the coming years."

### Notable Faculty Appointments & Honors

**Vice Chancellor Appointments from MBM:**
- **Dr. Akhil Ranjan Garg** (Professor, Electrical Engineering): Appointed as Vice Chancellor of Bikaner Technical University, Bikaner

**Faculty Recognition:**
1. **Prof. Akhil Ranjan Garg:** Lifetime achievement award for 3-decade contribution to technical education
2. **Capt. Kamlesh Kumar** (Assistant Professor, Architecture): Conferred rank of Captain for national service
3. **Dr. Kailash Chaudhary:** Selected as Regional Mentor of Change under ATAL Innovation Mission (AIM), NITI Aayog
